original_title: 彼女の親友がバレたら絶体絶命な状況で中出しおねだり囁き誘惑 琴石ゆめる
overview: Her best friend, Yumerun, seduces her ears with her honey voice! During online games, in the rest room of the office, in a quiet pub... I know we're dating, but when I turn around, she's testing me with demonic whispers from a distance where I can see her. "I liked you both before we started dating" "Only once before we got married" "You haven't had sex recently, have you?" What should I do if I say "You can put it inside"! !
title: If Her Best Friend Gets Caught, She Will Be Tempted To Get A Creampie To Get Out Of Her Desperate Situation – Yumeru Kotoishi
